## ILockStepVersionJson interface

This interface represents the raw lock-step version policy JSON object which extends the base version policy with additional fields specific to lock-step versioning.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ILockStepVersionJson extends IVersionPolicyJson 
```
**Extends:** [IVersionPolicyJson](./rush-lib.iversionpolicyjson.md)
